properties.entry: select inquire_no,inquire_title,inquire_content,USER_ID,create_date,a.status from inquire a join MEMBER on (inquire_Writer = user_no)
select inquire_no,inquire_title,inquire_content,USER_ID,create_date,a.status from inquire a join MEMBER on (inquire_Writer = user_no) where a.status = 'Y'
select inquire_no,inquire_title,inquire_content,USER_ID,create_date,a.status from inquire a join MEMBER on (inquire_Writer = user_no) where a.status = 'N'
select inquire_no,inquire_title,inquire_content,USER_ID,create_date,a.status,answer from inquire a join MEMBER on (inquire_Writer = user_no) where INQUIRE_NO = ?
update inquire SET STATUS = 'N',ANSWER=? where inquire_no=?
